name: native-blog
description: These days JavaScript, HTML5 and CSS3 allow us to build serious applications without the need of additional frameworks. With the latest ES6(EcmaScript 2015) we have modules, classes, promises, template strings with tag functions,  destructuring, generators, the for-of loop and many more. This makes it easier and without the need of big overhead to create a complete dynamic web application.
author: Iliyan Trifonov
